response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit you. Given its high value and importance to you, I propose a special introductory price of $9,500. This offer is exclusive to you and represents a significant savings compared to the market value. I trust this price will make it accessible while still allowing me to fairly compensate for the product's worth. I look forward to your consideration and hope we can reach an agreement that benefits us both.", "product_price": 9500}
